official_title: A bill to amend the United States Code to clarify the intent of Congress in adopting title IX of the Education Act Amendments of 1972.

summary.text: Sex Discrimination Prohibition Act of 1984 - Amends the Education Amendments of 1972 to include educational institutions receiving Federal financial assistance within the prohibition against sex discrimination.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Code to clarify the intent of Congress in adopting title IX of the Education Act Amendments of 1972.
